CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Revelyst, Inc. engages in the manufacture and sale of protective gear and apparel, footwear, hydration, and e-mobility products. It offers motocross, mountain biking, cycling, and snow sports protection products and accessories, bike hydration packs and water bottles, and e-bikes. The company also offers outdoor cooking, fishing, outdoor accessories, technical gear, and apparel brands that include waders, sportswear, outerwear, footwear, fishing tools and accessories, performance optics, outdoor accessories, and outdoor cooking equipment. In addition, it offers golf technology products that include golf GPS devices, laser rangefinders, and launch monitors. The company sells its products through a network of distributors in the United States and internationally. The company was incorporated in 2022 and is based in Bozeman, Montana.
